creditline: Gift of Molly Klobe, New York
description: standing hunchback man, seen from back, wearing a cap and holding a pair of buckets, releasing vapor
inscription:
Inscription and Mark

bottom edge, in brown ink: [Mon amour vous envoie sur l\'aile du Zephir, le parfum de quelques fleurs et Milles baisers !!!!!!!!!!!]; on back, in pencil: various notes and marks
markings: LRC, in black: illegible collector\'s mark
medium: Brown ink on heavy buff paper
provenance: Private collection, England. [Eric Carlson, New York, 1989]; [Molly Klobe, Chamberlin Gallery, New York, until 2002; given to Mia]
title: Hunchback [standing figure seen from behind]
